hanzi-su-wiki:
繰

Значения

Наматывать, скручивать; перебирать; прясть

Мнемоника

Галдящие 品 птицы на дереве 木. Шум от перемотки ниток 糸.

Варианты

缲

Keyword_KANJIDIC: winding, reel, spin, turn (pages), look up, refer to
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Обмотка, катушка, спина, поворот (страницы), посмотреть, см
koohiiStory1: Winding thread around wooden goods (paper) to ready them for safe transport.
koohiiStory2: After stopping a bank heist, Spiderman is seen winding his webbing around the stolen goods to trap them in a tree until the police arrive to take them back.
jp_example_words:
繰り返す(くりかえす): repeat, do over again
引っ繰り返す(ひっくりかえす): turn over, overturn, knock over, upset, turn inside out
引っ繰り返る(ひっくりかえる): be overturned, be upset, topple over, be reversed
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have thread and some syrup and you need to spin them together. Drip the syrup onto the thread and spin it around and around over your head.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine carefully dripping syrup onto a thread and then spinning it in a circle.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you spin the syrup, it begins to change shape and forms into a cookie (く)! Haven't you ever made syrup-spun cookies before? The spinning forms and cooks them in the air.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine eating a syrup cookie you made by spinning it yourself. Homemade is always better than store-bought.
Ru_Meaning: winding, reel, spin, turn (pages), look up, refer to
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 繰 (くる、ソウ мотать), 燥 (はしゃぐ、ソウ сушить), 操 (あやつる、ソウ управлять), 噪 (さわぐ、ソウ шуметь)
Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 木 (дерево), 糸 (нить), 品 (товар)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) by the goods in the tree (喿) is to wind them

繰字的基本解释

繰
qiāo

繰
sāo
均见“缲”。

繰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǎo］
［《廣韻》子晧切，上晧，精。］
“缲1”的繁体字。
(1)深青带红色之帛。
(2)冕旒的绳子。
[②]［sāo］
［《廣韻》蘇遭切，平豪，心。］
同“繅1”。“缲2”的繁体字。
抽丝。
[③]［qiāo］
同“繑1”。亦作“鏒2”。“缲3”的繁体字。
一种缝纫方法。把布边往里卷，然后藏着针脚缝。

繰字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繰； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页940第21
【集韻】子皓切，音早。【說文】帛如紺色。【博雅】繰謂之縑。　又【集韻】千遙切，音鍫。又七小切，音悄。義?同。　又【集韻】蘇遭切，音騷。【玉篇】同繅。詳繅字註。　【廣韻】俗又作縿，非。縿本音衫。繅字原从臼作。

繰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
繰字的起名意思

暂无。

缲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǎo］
["Guangyun" Zi Hao cut, Shang Hao, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "缲1".
(1) Deep blue and red silk.
(2) Mianqi's rope.
[②]［sāo］
["Guangyun" Su Zuoqie, Pinghao, Xin. ]
Same as "Reeling 1". Traditional characters for "缲2".
Snagging.
[③] [qiāo]
Same as "繑1". Also known as "鏒2". Traditional characters for "缲3".
A sewing method. Roll the edge of the cloth in, and then hide the stitches.
缲

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缲; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 940-21
[Ji Yun] Zi Hao cut, the sound is early. 【Speaking text】The silk is like cyan. 【Liberal Arts】Shenzhen is said to be 缣.　[Jiyun] Qianyao cut, sound. Another seven small cuts, the sound is quiet. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Su Zuoqie, Yin Sao. [Jade articles] The same reeling. Detailed reeling of the word note.　[Guangyun] The vulgar and the 縿, the non. Yi Ben Yin shirt. The reeling character was originally made from the mortar.

Name meaning

zǎo, sāo, qiāo
вм. 缲
Radicals: 糸, 喿  (thread, syrup)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have thread and some syrup and you need to spin them together. Drip the syrup onto the thread and spin it around and around over your head.
Imagine carefully dripping syrup onto a thread and then spinning it in a circle.
Reading Mnemonic
As you spin the syrup, it begins to change shape and forms into a cookie (く)! Haven't you ever made syrup-spun cookies before? The spinning forms and cooks them in the air.
Imagine eating a syrup cookie you made by spinning it yourself. Homemade is always better than store-bought.

Сравни: 繰 (くる、ソウ мотать), 燥 (はしゃぐ、ソウ сушить), 操 (あやつる、ソウ управлять), 噪 (さわぐ、ソウ шуметь)
